attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the prescription charge should be removed because lets face it, we pay enough in our national contributions im sure there are a lot of people out there who are ill, get a prescription from their G.P and simply cant afford to pay for their much needed medication, if scotland can do it then why cant we !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
